title: Foxworth Friday: Fox vs. Russo and Lamar Jackson Not in 'Top 10' Lists? Also, Adam Silver Doesn't Like Trade Requests
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss the “fireworks” Fox made with Chris Russo on First Take (1:09), how they feel about Ravens QB Lamar Jackson getting left off of “Top 10” lists (8:30), as well as NBA Commissioner Adam Silver being unhappy with players expressing their desire to be traded from their current team (23:35).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
